name: Chicken Rice Nation
description:
A humble chicken rice stall in Singapore has hired you as its financial advisor. Buy outlets and sabotage other companies in order to lead Chicken Rice Nation to ascendance and take over the Singaporean food industry!

This game is a prototype of possible systems and mechanics for a grand strategy game based around corporate warfare. It isn't really a complete experience but is playable enough to release.

Source on GitHub

How to Play

Use the mouse to navigate the interface and click on stuff.

Moving the mouse to the edge of the screen pans the map. The mouse wheel zooms in and out.

There isn't really a menu so you will have to quit out of the game with Alt+F4, Command-Q, or the equivalent.
